# tryLock()

**Instance Method**

Attempts to acquire a lock.

## Declaration

```swift
func tryLock() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if a lock was acquired, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Discussion

This method returns immediately after the attempt to acquire a lock.

## Deprecated instance methods

- **init(concurrencyType:)**: Creates a context that uses the specified concurrency type.
- **init()**
- **lock()**: Attempts to acquire a lock on the context.
- **unlock()**: Relinquishes a previously acquired lock.
